data.title: Find a Senior Community Service Employment Program Near You
data.meta_description: Are you over 55 and between jobs? You may qualify for paid on-the-job training through the Senior Community Service Employment Program (SCSEP).
data.text:
AARP Foundation wants to help adults 55+ gain the skills to land better jobs with paid on-the-job training. Apply to be matched with a local nonprofit or public agency to gain valuable work experience while earning a modest income. Enter your address or zip code below to see if the Senior Community Service Employment Program is available in your area.

You clicked on a link to a website that is not affiliated with AARP Foundation. That website's terms, conditions and policies apply.

If you do not wish to leave this website, please click cancel.
